ow.routing
インタフェース RoutingRuntime

既知の実装クラスの一覧:
AbstractRoutingDriver, IterativeRoutingDriver, RecursiveRoutingDriver
public interface RoutingRuntime

An interface through which a routing algorithm (like Kademlia) works on a routing runtime, which provides facilities like communication.
